languages.text: "Угрозы нет. Но мне было откровение. И я желаю тебе кое-что показать. Теперь, когда крипта очищена, нет места лучше".

traits.locale_text: "Нет. Но я хотела бы, чтобы ты принял участие в ритуале. Теперь, когда крипта очищена... нет места лучше".

languages.text: "There is no threat. I have been granted a revelation, and I wish to show you something. Now that the crypt has been purged, there is no place better suited."
languages.original_text: "Угрозы нет. Но мне было откровение. И я желаю тебе кое-что показать. Теперь, когда крипта очищена, нет места лучше".

traits.locale_text: "There is no threat. I have been granted a revelation. And I wish to show you something. Now that the crypt has been purged, there is no place better suited."
"There is no threat. I have been granted a revelation. And I wish to show you something. Now that the crypt has been purged, there is no place better suited."
"There is no threat. I have been granted a revelation, and I wish to show you something. Now that the crypt has been purged, there is no place better suited."
"There is no threat. I have been granted a revelation, and I wish to show you something. Now that the crypt has been purged, there is no place better suited."
"There is no threat. I have been granted a revelation, and I wish to show you something. Now that the crypt has been purged, there is no place better suited."
"There is no threat. I have been granted a revelation, and I wish to show you something. Now that the crypt has been purged, there is no place better suited."

languages.text: "Es gibt keine Gefahr. Mir wurde eine Offenbarung zuteil, und ich wünsche Euch etwas zu zeigen. Nun, da die Krypta gesäubert ist, gibt es keinen besseren Ort dafür."
languages.original_text: "There is no threat. I have been granted a revelation, and I wish to show you something. Now that the crypt has been purged, there is no place better suited."

traits.locale_text: "Es gibt keine Gefahr. Mir wurde eine Offenbarung zuteil, und ich wünsche Euch etwas zu zeigen. Nun, da die Krypta gesäubert ist, gibt es keinen besseren Ort dafür."

languages.text: «No hay ninguna amenaza. Se me ha otorgado una revelación y quiero mostrarle algo. Ahora que la cripta está purgada, no hay lugar más apropiado».
languages.original_text: "There is no threat. I have been granted a revelation, and I wish to show you something. Now that the crypt has been purged, there is no place better suited."

traits.locale_text: «No hay ninguna amenaza. Se me ha otorgado una revelación y quiero mostrarle algo. Ahora que la cripta está purgada, no hay lugar más apropiado».

languages.text: 「脅威はない。啓示を受けて、あなたに見せたいものがあるの。地下墓地が浄化された今、あそこ以上にふさわしい場所はないわ」
languages.original_text: "There is no threat. I have been granted a revelation, and I wish to show you something. Now that the crypt has been purged, there is no place better suited."

traits.locale_text: 「脅威はない。啓示を受けて、あなたに見せたいものがあるの。地下墓地が浄化された今、あそこ以上にふさわしい場所はないわ」

languages.text: “没有发生任何威胁。我得到了启示，想给你看些东西。现在地下墓穴已经被清理干净了，没有比那里更合适的地方了。”
languages.original_text: "There is no threat. I have been granted a revelation, and I wish to show you something. Now that the crypt has been purged, there is no place better suited."

traits.locale_text: “没有发生任何威胁。我得到了启示，想给你看些东西。现在地下墓穴已经被清理干净了，没有比那里更合适的地方了。”

languages.text: « Il n'y a pas de danger. J'ai eu une révélation, et j'aimerais vous montrer quelque chose. Et il n'y a pour cela pas de lieu plus adapté que la crypte, maintenant qu'elle a été purgée. »
languages.original_text: "There is no threat. I have been granted a revelation, and I wish to show you something. Now that the crypt has been purged, there is no place better suited."

traits.locale_text: « Il n'y a pas de danger. J'ai eu une révélation, et j'aimerais vous montrer quelque chose. Et il n'y a pour cela pas de lieu plus adapté que la crypte, maintenant qu'elle a été purgée. »

languages.text: "Herhangi bir tehdit yok. Bana bir vahiy bahşedildi, sana göstermek istediğim bir şey var. Mahzen de arındırıldığına göre daha uygun bir yer olamaz."
languages.original_text: "There is no threat. I have been granted a revelation, and I wish to show you something. Now that the crypt has been purged, there is no place better suited."
